TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceMetadataBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 控制服務中繼資料與相關資訊的發行。

span.span: Controls the publication of service metadata and associated information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新增物件至集合 (或[ <serviceMetadata> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicemetadata.md)應用程式組態檔中的項目) 來啟用或停用發行服務中繼資料。Add a object to the collection (or the [<serviceMetadata>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicemetadata.md) element in an application configuration file) to enable or disable the publication of service metadata. 然而，將行為加入至服務並不足以啟用中繼資料發行：However, adding the behavior to a service is not sufficient to enable metadata publication: - 若要啟用 WS-Transfer GET 中繼資料擷取，您也必須將端點新增至合約為 `IMetadataExchange` 的服務。To enable WS-Transfer GET metadata retrieval, you must also add an endpoint to your service in which the contract is `IMetadataExchange`. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 發行中繼資料服務使用程式碼](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-code.md)。For an example, see [How to: Publish Metadata for a Service Using Code](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-code.md). 您可以將 `IMetadataExchange` 端點設定為任何其他端點。The `IMetadataExchange` endpoint can be configured as can any other endpoint. - 若要啟用 HTTP GET 中繼資料擷取，請將 屬性設定為 `true`。To enable HTTP GET metadata retrieval, set the property to `true`. 如需詳細的 HTTP GET 中繼資料位址的相關資訊，請參閱。For more information about the address of HTTP GET metadata, see . `IMetadataExchange` 端點的位址會遵循與結合基底位址和端點位址相關的一般規則。The address of the `IMetadataExchange` endpoint follows the normal rules regarding the combination of base addresses and endpoint addresses. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 中繼資料發行](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/publishing-metadata.md)。For more information, see [Publishing Metadata](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/publishing-metadata.md). 若要啟用使用組態檔的中繼資料的發行，加入[ <serviceMetadata> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicemetadata.md)項目[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md)項目，並將關聯的項目[<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)您要發行中繼資料的項目。To enable the publication of metadata using a configuration file, add the [<serviceMetadata>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicemetadata.md) element to the [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) element and associate the element with the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element for which you want to publish metadata. 如需範例，請參閱[如何： 使用組態檔的服務發行中繼資料](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-a-configuration-file.md)。For an example, see [How to: Publish Metadata for a Service Using a Configuration File](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-a-configuration-file.md). 此類別具有下列成員：The class has the following members: - 屬性會指定是否針對 HTTP/GET 要求傳回中繼資料。The property specifies whether metadata is returned for HTTP/GET requests. - 屬性 (搭配基底位址) 會指定 HTTP/GET 位址。The property (in conjunction with the base addresses) specifies the HTTP/GET address. - 屬性會指定是否針對 HTTPS/GET 要求傳回中繼資料。The property specifies whether metadata is returned for an HTTPS/GET request. - 屬性 (與基底位址連結) 會指定 HTTPS/GET 位址。The property (in conjunction with the base addresses) specifies the HTTPS/GET address. - 屬性會傳回基礎匯出工具。The property returns the underlying exporter. 一般來說， 是從應用程式組態檔中使用。Typically the is used from an application configuration file. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱＜範例＞一節。See the Example section for a code example. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何在組態檔中使用 ，以啟用 HTTP GET 和 WS-Transfer GET 要求的中繼資料支援。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a configuration file to enable metadata support for HTTP GET and WS-Transfer GET requests. [!code-csharp[ServiceMetadataBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicemetadatabehavior/cs/hostapplication.cs#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值是服務中繼資料的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is the location of service metadata.
The location of the service metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將外部中繼資料位置的參考傳回用戶端。Returns a reference to an external metadata location to clients. 屬性可以是相對或絕對屬性。The property can be relative or absolute. 如果是相對屬性，則會視用戶端擷取中繼資料的方式，由相對於 或 的用戶端來解析位址。If relative, the address is resolved by the client relative to the or , depending on how the client retrieved the metadata.

exception.span: 此值為絕對值，而且結構描述既不是 http 也不是 https。

span.span: The value is absolute and the schema is neither http nor https.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ HttpGetBinding { System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ value); };
member this.HttpGetBinding : System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定當傳輸是 HTTP 時要用來配置中繼資料擷取的繫結。

span.span: Gets or sets a binding used to configure metadata retrieval when the transport is HTTP.

value.span: 可用於透過 HTTP 通訊協定來擷取中繼資料的 。

span.span: A that can be used to retrieve metadata over the HTTP protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 WCF 的舊版中，是使用 HTTP GET 透過網頁瀏覽器存取服務說明頁，以完成中繼資料的擷取。In previous versions of WCF, metadata retrieval was accomplished using HTTP GET to access the service help page through a web browser. 僅支援 。Only the was supported. 針對使用 HTTPS GET 的中繼資料擷取，僅支援 。For metadata retrieval using HTTPS GET, only the was supported. HttpGetBinding 與 HttpsGetBinding 屬性可啟用透過 HTTP GET (或 HTTPS GET) 進行的中繼資料擷取的繫結，以及用於存取可設定服務網頁的繫結 (不論是以程式來設計或透過組態檔)。The HttpGetBinding and HttpsGetBinding properties enable the usage of bindings for metadata retrieval using HTTP GET (or HTTPS GET) and the bindings used to access service web pages to be configurable, either programmatically or through configuration files. 如需有關如何擷取說明頁的詳細資訊，請使用和屬性。For more information about retrieving help pages, use the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpGetEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HttpGetEnabled : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出是否發行要使用 HTTP/GET 要求擷取的服務中繼資料。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to publish service metadata for retrieval using an HTTP/GET request.

value.span: 如果發行 WSDL 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the WSDL is published; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的值為相對值，則發行中繼資料的位址為基底位址和服務位址，外加一個 `?wsdl` 查詢字串。If the value of is relative, the address at which the metadata is published is the base address and the service address plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 如果 的值為絕對值，則發行中繼資料的位址為 的值，外加一個 `?wsdl` 查詢字串。If the value of is absolute the address at which the metadata is published is the value of value plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 例如，如果服務位址為 `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` 且 為空字串，則 HTTP/GET 中繼資料位址為 `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`。For example, if the service address is `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` and the is an empty string, the HTTP/GET metadata address is `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`. 如果您沒有啟用這個屬性，也沒有變更 或將它設定為相對位址，則在沒有使用 HTTP 的基底位址開啟服務主機時，就會在執行階段擲回例外狀況。If you do not enable this property and do not change or set it to a relative address, an exception is thrown at runtime when the service host is opened without a base address for HTTP. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何在組態檔中使用 ，以啟用 HTTP/GET 和 WS-Transfer/GET 要求的中繼資料支援。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a configuration file to enable metadata support for HTTP/GET and WS-Transfer/GET requests. [!code-csharp[ServiceMetadataBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicemetadatabehavior/cs/hostapplication.cs#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定為 HTTP/GET 要求發行中繼資料的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of metadata publication for HTTP/GET requests.

value.span: 中繼資料的絕對或相對位置。

span.span: The absolute or relative location of the metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的值為相對值，則發行中繼資料的位址為基底位址和服務位址，外加一個 `?wsdl` 查詢字串。If the value of is relative, the address at which the metadata is published is the base address and the service address plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 如果 的值為絕對值，則發行中繼資料的位址為此值，外加一個 `?wsdl` 查詢字串。If the value of is absolute the address at which the metadata is published is this value plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 例如，如果服務位址為 `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` 且 為空字串，則 HTTP/GET 中繼資料位址為 `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`。For example, if the service address is `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` and the is an empty string, the HTTP/GET metadata address is `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何在組態檔中使用 ，以啟用 HTTP/GET 和 WS-Transfer/GET 要求的中繼資料支援。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a configuration file to enable metadata support for HTTP/GET and WS-Transfer/GET requests. [!code-csharp[ServiceMetadataBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicemetadatabehavior/cs/hostapplication.cs#1)]

HttpGetBinding 與 HttpsGetBinding 屬性可啟用透過 HTTP GET (或 HTTPS GET) 進行的中繼資料擷取的繫結，以及用於存取可設定服務網頁的繫結 (不論是以程式來設計或透過組態檔)。The HttpGetBinding and HttpsGetBinding properties enable the usage of bindings for metadata retrieval using HTTP GET (or HTTPS GET) and the bindings used to access service web pages to be configurable, either programmatically or through configuration files. 如需有關如何擷取說明頁的詳細資訊，請使用和屬性。For more information about retrieving help pages, use the and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的值為相對值，則發行中繼資料的位址為基底位址和服務位址，外加一個 `?wsdl` 查詢字串。If the value of is relative, the address at which the metadata is published is the base address and the service address plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 如果 的值為絕對值，則發行中繼資料的位址為 的值，外加一個 `?wsdl` 查詢字串。If the value of is absolute the address at which the metadata is published is the value of value plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 例如，如果服務位址為 `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` 且 為空字串，則 HTTPS/GET 中繼資料位址為 `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`。For example, if the service address is `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` and the is an empty string, the HTTPS/GET metadata address is `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`.
